Name: Curse (Intimidate)
Effect: Single Target. Roll half of the User's HP as Typeless Damage Dice to itself, ignore defenses. The Target will remove 1 Success from all of their Rolls until the Curse is lifted.
Description: The user mutters an evil incantation, misery will befall into the foe at the cost of the user’s soul. To get rid of the curse, perform an exorcism or get help at a Pokémon Center
